title: SOLD T206 John Titus SGC SOLD
author: Shoele$$

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 John Titus SGC SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,

For sale is a beautiful, tough and highly sought after SGC 30 T206 John Titus.  Card has a couple very light creases as you can see, but doesn't affect the 'stache's image at all, accurately graded IMO.  Price is SOLD firm shipped and insured via Paypal gift.  Please PM if interested.  Thanks

[IMG]http://i27.photobucket.com/albums/c182/grw1911/image-50.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i27.photobucket.com/albums/c182/grw1911/image-51.jpg[/IMG]
I've been receiving numerous trade offers, but I'd prefer cash only for this transaction at this time.  Thanks

A PSA 3 Titus (generous 3) just went for $153 on Ebay.  Prices are continuing to climb.

And an SGC 30 WITH paper loss on the back just went for $114....

A PSA 1.5 sold for $124 a little over a month ago...

Looks like an SGC 40 Titus just went for $161 last night in Sterling....

I feel like I'm giving this away.  If it doesn't sell by the weekend, it's getting pulled.
